name: Sensodyne Fresh Impact Toothpaste With Fluoride, 4 oz

reviews.name: Sensodyne Fresh Impact Toothpaste With Fluoride, 4 oz
reviews.reviewText: my local stores stopped carrying it so thankfully you can get it online so I bought 5 tubes!!! the best!
reviews.title: best toothpaste

reviews.name: Sensodyne Fresh Impact Toothpaste With Fluoride, 4 oz
reviews.reviewText: This has a fresh Minty taste, tastes better than the other Sensodyne toothpaste. Keeps your mouth fresh for hours and stops the pain in your teeth.
reviews.title: Sensodyne Fresh

reviews.name: Sensodyne Fresh Impact Toothpaste With Fluoride, 4 oz
reviews.reviewText: I am 64 years old and my teeth are sensitive. When I use Sensodyne, I am able to eat everything from ice cream to hot tamales. It wasn't always that way. Other toothpaste simply cleaned my teeth. Sensodine, as I was told by my dentist, coats sensitive areas of my mouth and fills tiny lines that cause me discomfort. I highly recommend Sensodyne. Even for the higher price it is an exceptional deal.
reviews.title: For those with sensitive teeth, this is the best!
